about.title: About me
about.description: I am a frontend developer focused on creating clean, fast and visually impactful experiences.

items.title: Wedding invitation
items.description: Project developed for my wedding. Includes guest management, confirmation via email, calendar integration, and an admin panel.

items.title: Piano Synthesizer
items.description: An interactive piano that displays the notes being played. It follows musical rules such as chords and intervals, showing them on screen as you play.
